alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion; Inland Flagler; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 3:48AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WESTERN FLAGLER...SOUTH CENTRAL ST. JOHNS...NORTHEASTERN MARION AND SOUTHEASTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 430 AM EDT... At 348 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Fruitland, or near Salt Springs, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crescent City, Pomona Park, Salt Springs, Andalusia, Lake Delancy, Fruitland, Welaka, Lake Como, and Georgetown. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EDT for northern and northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Marion; Inland Flagler; Western Putnam
